mapper.select: select a.*,b.cmt_writer,b.cmt_content, b.cmt_date,b.cmt_no from cb_board a left outer join cb_cmt b on (a.board_id = b.board_id) where a.board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.update: update cb_board set board_content = #{boardContent} where board_id=#{boardId}
mapper.delete: delete from cb_board where board_id = #{boardId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update cb_board set board_hit = board_hit + 1 where board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: insert into cb_cmt(cmt_no, cmt_content, board_id, cmt_writer) values(CMT_SEQ.nextval, #{cmtContent}, #{boardId}, #{cmtWriter})
mapper.update: update cb_cmt set cmt_content = #{cmtContent} where cmt_no = #{cmtNo} and board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.delete: delete from cb_cmt where cmt_no = #{cmtNo} and board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.update: update cb_board set board_cmt_num = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cb_cmt WHERE board_id= #{boardId} ) where board_id = #{boardId}
